string.name: hiUser
string.comment: %s is the title+username e.g. 'GM ABC' or simply ABC if there is no title

resources.string: Hi, %s
What have you been up to this year?
What a chess year you had!
You did not play any games this year.
Wanna play now?

string.name: gamesYouWon
string.comment: %s is the number of games won

resources.string: And you won %s!
What did it take to get there?

string.name: timeSpentPlayingExclam
string.comment: %s is the time spent playing animated from 0 e.g. '1 day, 17 hours'. The time is also translated

resources.string: %s spent playing!
That is way too much chess.
That is a lot of chess.
That seems like a reasonable amount of chess.
How many moves did you play in all that time?

string.name: movesOfWoodPushed
string.comment: %s is a weight in grams or kilograms

resources.string: That's %s of wood pushed!
Standard pieces weigh about 40g each
Your best chess foes

string.name: firstMoveStats
string.comment: Subtitle to your most played move e.g. '1. e4'. %s is the number of games played and its percentage in parentheses. e.g. '50 (67%)'

resources.string: is how you started %s of your games as white
Your most played opening as white with %s
Your most played opening as black with %s

plurals.name: puzzlesThanksVoting
plurals.comment: %s is the number of puzzles. It is also translated.
plurals.item: Thank you for voting on %s puzzle.
Thank you for voting on %s puzzles.

resources.string: You also helped tagging %s of them.
You did not solve any puzzles this year.
Wanna try some now?
You won %s of them on the first try!
Pool pairing
Where did you find games?
What time controls and variants did you play?
%s ads and trackers loaded
We didn't sell your personal data
We didn't use your device against you
But other websites do, so please %s

string.name: malwareWarningCta
string.comment: It is a link to https://lichess.org/ads

resources.string: be careful.

string.name: lichessGamesPlayedIn
string.comment: %1$s is the number of games, %2$s is the year

resources.string: %1$s games played on Lichess in %2$s

string.name: lichessGamesOfThemYours
string.comment: %s is the percentage of games that are yours

resources.string: %s of them are yours.
Thank you for playing on Lichess!
We're glad you're here. Have a great %s!
My %s Recap

string.name: shareableSpentPlaying
string.comment: subtitle to the translated time they have spent playing

resources.string: spent playing
most played opponent
favourite variant
favourite time control

string.name: recapReady
string.comment: %s is the year of the recap

resources.string: Your %s recap is ready!
